sep.gaia.resources.mode3d

Class Earth

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.mode3d.Earth

  • public class Earth
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the three dimensional view of the earth by visualizing a texture of the globe in OpenGL and holding the radius of the earth. There are two features available: first, the rotation around the vertical and horizontal axis of the earth and second, the zoom in and zoom out function.
    Author:
    Fabian Buske (specification), Max Witzelsperger (implementation), Matthias Fisch (implementation)

      • createScheduledTextures

        public void createScheduledTextures(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl)
        Creates all textures scheduled by scheduleAvailableTextures(). This method must be called from the OpenGL-thread in order to prevent unexpected behavior.
        Parameters:
        gl - The GL function-set to use.
